Word Count Stat Pro is a lightweight, easy-to-use Chrome extension that provides instant text analysis at your fingertips. With just a right-click, you can quickly get:

ğŸ”¢ Character count
ğŸ“š Word count
ğŸ“ Average word length

ğŸŒŸ Why Should You Install Word Count Stat Pro?

âš¡ Instant Analysis: No need to copy and paste text into separate tools. Analyze any selected text on any webpage with a single click.
ğŸš€ Boost Productivity: Save time and streamline your workflow by getting text statistics directly in your browser.
âœï¸ Improve Your Writing: Easily track your word count and average word length to meet specific writing requirements or improve your writing style.
ğŸŒ Universal Compatibility: Works on any webpage, making it perfect for online writing platforms, social media, or any text-based website.
ğŸ”’ Privacy-Focused: All analysis is done locally in your browser. Your text is never sent to external servers.
ğŸ“š Zero Learning Curve: Simple, intuitive interface that's ready to use right after installation.

ğŸ“ Whether you're crafting the perfect essay, optimizing content for SEO, or simply curious about your writing metrics, Word Count Stat Pro is the tool you need. Install now and transform the way you interact with text online!
